name: Pastefy
short_description: Feature-rich self-hosted pastebin for sharing code.
description: Feature-rich self-hosted pastebin for sharing code. Pastefy is a self-hosted application focused on tools, productivity, git, development. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose. It supports a wide range of use cases for homelabs and self-hosted infrastructure.
usecases: Self-host Pastefy on your home server to feature-rich self-hosted pastebin for sharing code without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Pastefy to manage your tools workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
